document_data.name: Rusteen
document_data.mainbody:
{{wikipedia article|microlite}}
'''Rusteen''' was the Realms name for [[wikipedia:en:microlite|microlite]].
document_data.Description: Rusteen occurred in shades of brown from pale to dark reddish brown. They were small but very hard and could be cut into faceted gems and used to decorate swords, armor, shields, and horse tack. A typical specimen had a base value of 500 [[gold pieces]].
document_data.Powers: This precious stone could be used as a material component for ''[[forcecage]]'' and ''[[wall of force]]'' spells.
